title: Retrieve Late Accounting Date Rule Response
description: Retrieve Late Accounting Date Rule Response

disapply.description: Indicates whether the taxpayer is electing to opt out of the automatic application of the Late Accounting Date Rule (LADR)

eligible.description: Indicates whether the income source is eligible to disapply the late accounting date rule. Only businesses with an accounting date (Period of Account) that falls between 31 March and 4 April inclusive are eligible.

taxYearOfElection.description: Indicates the first year that the disapplication commenced. This field is only returned when disapply is set to true

taxYearElectionExpires.description: Indicates the last tax year for the disapplication.
